thread.title: Toronto's Trump hotel hit by credit card hackers - The Toronto Star
thread.title_full: Toronto's Trump hotel hit by credit card hackers - The Toronto Star - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Toronto Star
title: Toronto's Trump hotel hit by credit card hackers - The Toronto Star
text:
Customer credit and debit card numbers may have been stolen at seven Trump hotels after its payment systems were hacked for nearly a year. The Trump Hotel Collection said on its website that hackers gained access to its systems between May 2014 and June 2015 at the front desk of those hotels.
 The Toronto Star.
